title: Period Calculator
description: Predict your next period and ovulation dates
metaDescription: Free period calculator - Predict your next period, ovulation dates, and fertile window. Track your menstrual cycle easily.

form.title: Enter Your Information
form.lastPeriodHelp: Date when your last menstruation started
form.cycleLengthHelp: Average number of days between periods (typically 28 days)
form.periodLengthHelp: Number of days your period lasts (typically 5 days)

info.title: About the Period Calculator
info.description: This calculator predicts your upcoming menstrual periods and ovulation dates based on your last period and average cycle length. Ovulation typically occurs 14 days before the next period.
info.formula: Formula: Next period = Last period + Cycle length. Ovulation = Next period - 14 days
info.limitations: Note: This calculator provides estimates based on regular cycles. Menstrual cycles can vary naturally. For medical concerns or cycle irregularities, please consult with a healthcare professional.
